title: Drawing, 1917-4-849, 1853, probably May
markings: Verso:  Stamped in ink, at center:  Lugt 457d
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, at upper center:  vine & / young palm; again, at upper right:  Light yellow green; again, at center left: A group of Bamboos / a bunch of stems with / rich light masses of delicate / yellowish green foliage; and at center right:  common & / curious effects / of rain.
description: Horizontal view of bamboos with stems, a vine and a young palm, and plant top across the upper half of sheet and two designs for curious and common effects of rain falling from clouds over ridges.
